background_description: The background consists of a dimly lit aquatic environment with blurred rocky structures or coarse substrate visible in the distance. The water appears dark and indistinct, suggesting a deeper part of a reef or an aquarium setting.
explanation: The image clearly depicts a Clown Triggerfish (Balistoides conspicillum) with striking and highly contrasting black, bright yellow, and light-colored patterns. These bold colors and distinct patterns make the fish extremely conspicuous against the dark, muted, and indistinct background, unequivocally demonstrating the absence of camouflage.
